alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 12:14PM CDT until August 06 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1213 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Randolph, or 15 miles southwest of Pontotoc, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Trace State Park, Troy, Furrs, Houlka, Randolph, New Houlka, Algoma, Robbs, Chiwapa, Reid, Pannell, Matthews, Sarepta, Wallfield and George P Cossar State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
